workout_file.description: This optional training can be done in any other day of the week, not necessarily as last day.
workout_file.name: Week 2.5 - Active Recovery

textevent.message: Welcome to the active recovery day of Week 2 in the 6 week Beginner FTP Builder.
Today is optional, and can be done any other day of the week, not necessarily the last day.
Today's workout consists of 6 times, 5mins at zone 1, plus 2mins at zone 2.
Today should be a VERY light day and is really serving to just allow you to spin your legs out.
So, this should not add any additional fatigue, and if you are feeling progressively more tired, cut the workout short.
Today should leave you feeling better than when you first got on the bike :-)
I'd advise using ERG today if possible to keep yourself from going too hard.
Chasing those 'carrots' on Zwift is so easy, but it's crucial you respect the power targets today.
Coming up in 30sec, we're going to do 2mins at zone 2, at 100 RPM.
The high cadence should help loosen the legs up as well as continue to work on your ability to spin the gear with good form.
Start bringing the cadence up now...
Make sure you're keeping the power low here, but your leg speed nice and high.
That's halfway. Keep those legs spinning quick!
In 10sec, we're going to reduce to 90 RPM and go back to zone 1.
Bring the cadence and power back down again in a controlled manner here.
And we'll continue to spin nice and easy for 5mins.
Get ready for another 2mins high cadence effort next. Aim for 100 RPM again!
Bring the effort up again just slightly.
That's halfway. Keep those legs spinning quick!
In 10sec, we're going to reduce to 90 RPM and go back to zone 1.
Great work respecting the power targets today. Sometimes going easy takes more mental effort than going hard.
We'll continue to spin nice and easy for 5mins here.
Get ready for another 2mins high cadence effort next. Aim for 100 RPM again!
Spin those legs out now. They should hopefully be feeling nice and loose by now :-)
That's halfway. Keep those legs spinning quick!
In 10sec, we're going to reduce to 90 RPM and go back to zone 1.
Bring the effort back down again. Remember, feel free to cut this workout short at any time.
We'll continue to spin nice and easy for 5mins here.
Get ready for another 2mins high cadence effort next. Aim for 100 RPM again!
Make sure you're keeping the power low here, but your leg speed nice and high.
That's halfway. Keep those legs spinning quick!
In 10sec, we're going to reduce to 90 RPM and go back to zone 1.
Bring the cadence and power back down again in a controlled manner here.
And we'll continue to spin nice and easy for 5mins.
Get ready for another 2mins high cadence effort next. Aim for 100 RPM again!
Bring the effort up again just slightly.
That's halfway. Keep those legs spinning quick!
In 10sec, we're going to reduce to 90 RPM and go back to zone 1.
Just 1 more high cadence effort to go :-)
We'll continue to spin nice and easy for 5mins here.
Get ready for another 2mins high cadence effort next. Aim for 100 RPM again!
All right, last little bit of effort today, spin 'em out!
That's halfway. Keep those legs spinning quick!
In 10sec, we're going to reduce to 90 RPM and go back to zone 1.
Great work today. That session was very easy, but just as important to the grand scheme of the plan.
We'll spend a little bit more time just spinning the legs easy, then wrap it up.
See you next time!
